Transcription for 2010126

Mr. Kanhai Chatterjee, he has been one of the senior committee members for a long long time
and has actually been involved in the Welsh Puja Committee for over 30 years, probably.
So, Kanhai, can you say how and when you got involved in Durga Puja and festival?
When I first came to Portcombe, after I got married in 1975, obvious reasons that we are looking for somewhere
where the puja is going to take place and that's how we got involved in 1975.
So, you were actually involved in the first year or two of puja starting because Durga Puja started in 1974, I think, in somebody's house.
Yes, after one year we started.
